channel.title: Form on Jashua R. White
channel.description: Recent content in Form on Jashua R. White

item.title: Setting up an AJAX-based Formspree form
item.description: Back when I converted my site from WordPress to Hugo, one of the issues I had to take care of was setting up a processor for my contact form. I decided to go with Formspree as their free tier easily handled the amount of form submissions I got per month.
